front.title: Recommendations for Recording Directory Access Data

abstract.t: The Service Provider Directory-enabled Network Applications WG inthe Directory Interoperability Forum of the Open Group (seehttp://www.sp-dna.org) is looking at the use of LDAP-accessibledirectories for Service Provider applications. In the course of thiswork, we have found a few areas where existing LDAP standards do notmeet all the needs for a directory. This document addresses one sucharea - logging and auditing.
